name: PastPresentAndFuture
description:
I am to this day incapable of making games, but that does not stop me from trying new things.
This project is a prototype of what it could be a game in the future.
Even if it not much, I honestly enjoyed making this and I will enjoy making this as a game if I can find people interested in games like this.

What assets I used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/realistic-tree-9-rainb...
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/grass-flowers-pack-f...
music: bensound-betterdays

The terrain was made with world machine.
